FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user this session belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: source
FIELD.COMMENT: Where this session was recorded.

FIELD.NAME: starttime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this session was started.

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the session ended.

FIELD.NAME: tag
FIELD.COMMENT: Tag for the session.

FIELD.NAME: locale
FIELD.COMMENT: The locale for this session.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_keys
TABLE.COMMENT: Keys which may be pressed and released in keystroke events.

FIELD.NAME: keystring
FIELD.COMMENT: A string representation for this key

FIELD.NAME: agent
FIELD.COMMENT: The agent for this keycode entry.

FIELD.NAME: locale
FIELD.COMMENT: The locale for this keycode entry.

FIELD.NAME: keycode
FIELD.COMMENT: The key code for the key.

FIELD.NAME: keyid
FIELD.COMMENT: The key code for the key.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_dict
TABLE.COMMENT: Strings which may appear in an answer, not necessarily whole words.

FIELD.NAME: text
FIELD.COMMENT: The character sequence.

FIELD.NAME: postag
FIELD.COMMENT: A part of speech tag for character sequence.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_feature_sets
TABLE.COMMENT: Feature sets for behavioral biometric sequences.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: A name for the set of features.

FIELD.NAME: locale
FIELD.COMMENT: The locale this feature set was intended for.

FIELD.NAME: keystrokefeatures
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of keystroke feature ids.

FIELD.NAME: stylometryfeatures
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of stylometry feature ids.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_keystroke_features
TABLE.COMMENT: Temporal keystroke feature sets for behavioral biometric sequences.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Type of feature: duration, t1, t2, t3, t4

FIELD.NAME: group1
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of key ids for the first group.

FIELD.NAME: group2
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of key ids for the second group.

FIELD.NAME: fallback
FIELD.COMMENT: The feature to fall back to, or null.

FIELD.NAME: measure
FIELD.COMMENT: The measure function to use on the observations gathered for this feature.

FIELD.NAME: distance
FIELD.COMMENT: The distance between the two keystrokes in the sequence.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_stylometry_features
TABLE.COMMENT: Temporal keystroke feature sets for behavioral biometric sequences.

FIELD.NAME: featureset
FIELD.COMMENT: The feature set to which this feature belongs.

FIELD.NAME: group1
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of key ids for the first group.

FIELD.NAME: group2
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of key ids for the second group.

FIELD.NAME: fallback
FIELD.COMMENT: The feature to fall back to, or null.

FIELD.NAME: measure
FIELD.COMMENT: The measure function to use on the observations gathered for this feature.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_keystrokes
TABLE.COMMENT: Raw keystroke data collected during logging sessions.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user this event belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: sessionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the session this event was recorded during.

FIELD.NAME: keyid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the key that was pressed and released.

FIELD.NAME: presstime
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when this key was pressed.

FIELD.NAME: releasetime
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when this key was released.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_stylometry
TABLE.COMMENT: Stylometry events collected during logging sessions.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user this event belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: sessionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the session the even was recorded during.

FIELD.NAME: starttime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this event started.

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this event ended.

FIELD.NAME: text
FIELD.COMMENT: The text entered during the stylometry event

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user this session belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: tag
FIELD.COMMENT: Tag for the session.

FIELD.NAME: locale
FIELD.COMMENT: The locale for this session.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_demo_keystrokes
TABLE.COMMENT: Raw keystroke data collected during logging sessions.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user this event belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: sessionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the session this event was recorded during.

FIELD.NAME: keyid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the key that was pressed and released.

FIELD.NAME: presstime
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when this key was pressed.

FIELD.NAME: releasetime
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when this key was released.

TABLE.NAME: bioauth_demo_stylometry
TABLE.COMMENT: Stylometry events collected during logging sessions.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user this event belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: sessionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the session the even was recorded during.

FIELD.NAME: starttime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this event started.

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this event ended.

FIELD.NAME: text
FIELD.COMMENT: The text entered during the stylometry event
